section.p: You give the willow staff to the Oak Druid of the City of Trees. Cross the off your Adventure Sheet.
‘Ah, thank you,’ the druid intones, going on, ‘a willow staff, eh? I see.’

As a reward, the druid lets you train with the City of Trees’ best hunters and trackers. Gain 1 Rank, and . The result is the number of Stamina points you gain permanently. Also, don’t forget to increase your Defence by 1 as a result of your gain in Rank.
When you are ready, you leave the City of Trees and return to the Trading Post. .
